appDesc.message: Automagically like YouTube videos from your favorite content creators.

appDescDetail.message: All this extension does is hammer the like button whenever you watch a video from a subscribed channel. No effort required. No need to authenticate. Alternatively, you can automatically like EVERY video. Why? I dunno. Go nuts. Feel free to suggest new features or contribute:
appDescDetail.description: Detail description for the web store page

optLikeSub.message: Like only videos from subscribed channels

optWhiteListWarning.message: ⚠️ list is empty, nothing will be liked
